title: Executive Order 5465-Withdrawal of Public Land for Addition to the Benicia Arsenal Military Reservation, California
content: It is hereby ordered that lot 1, sec. 6, T. 2 N., R. 2 W., Mount Diablo meridian, in Solano County, State of California, containing 6.22 acres, be, and the same is hereby, withdrawn from settlement, location, entry, sale, and all forms of appropriation and reserved for military purposes as an addition to the Benicia Arsenal Military Reservation, Calif.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5465-Withdrawal of Public Land for Addition to the Benicia Arsenal Military Reservation, California Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361090
